snippet.title: Warhammer 40000 Dark Nexus arena trailer - PC Steam
snippet.description:
http://www.gamezplay.org - Independent channel - In the new Soul Hunter game mode players slay opponents, collect their souls and deliver them to the Dark Nexus in the centre of the level. The number of souls collected rises exponentially with each kill in a streak. If a player dies before they can deliver their souls, all souls in their possession are lost and their killer collects a portion. The first team to offer 50 souls to the Dark Nexus wins.   

The Lychguard is the first Veteran from the Necrons, the most requested faction during closed beta testing.
